original: Lindahl, Carl Johan Emil, kyrkoherde. Bankeryd, f. 30/10/99 i Långa-ryd, Jönköp. 1., av Alfred L. o. Constance Erlandsson. G. 30 m. Alice Hjersing. Barn: Ingvar f. 31, Karl-Gösta 32, Gun-Britt 35, Ulla 42. — Stud:ex. i Lund 26, teoL fil. ex. där 27, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 29. Tjg. som v. pastor i Reftele, v. kommin. i Herr-åkra, past:adj. i Kalvsvik samt v. pastor i Båraryd, kommin. i Ökna 30, i Lidhult 33, kyrkoh. i Bankeryd sed. 40, pred. v. Fristadens vårdhem där. Stiftsrådets ombud i Sunnerbo kontr. 36-40, missistyr. dito 37-40, ordf. i kyrkostämma, past:stämma, skolstyr., bibhstyr., stift. Bankeryds församl:-hem.
translated: Lindahl, Carl Johan Emil, pastor. Bankeryd, born on October 30, 1899 in Långa-ryd, Jönköp. Married to Alice Hjersing since 1930. Children: Ingvar (born in 1931), Karl-Gösta (1932), Gun-Britt (1935), Ulla (1942). — Completed a high school diploma in Lund in 1926, theological philosophy degree in 1927, theological candidate, practical theological examination, and ordained as a priest in the Växjö diocese in 1929. Served as a deputy pastor in Reftele, assistant curate in Herr-åkra, assistant pastor in Kalvsvik, and deputy pastor in Båraryd, curate in Ökna (from 1930), in Lidhult (from 1933), and as a vicar in Bankeryd since 1940, also preached at Fristadens care home. Representative of the diocese's council in the Sunnerbo district from 1936 to 1940, member of the mission committee from 1937 to 1940, chairman of the church assembly, pastor's assembly, school board, library board, and the diocese's Bankeryd parish council.
